title: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken and Dumpling Soup

Ingredients.2: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

Ingredients.3: 1 (22 ounce) can 98% fat-free condensed cream of chicken soup

Ingredients.4: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup

Ingredients.8: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen peas and carrots

Ingredients.9: 1 (10 ounce) can buttermilk biscuit dough, separated

Directions.1: Place diced onion in a slow cooker. Top with chicken.

Directions.2: Mix both condensed soups, poultry seasoning, and pepper together in a bowl; pour over the chicken in the slow cooker. Pour in chicken broth and cook until chicken is falling apart, on Low for 10 hours, or on High for 5 hours.

Directions.3: Pour in peas and carrots and cook on Low until soft, 1 to 2 hours more.

Directions.4: Roll out the biscuit dough thin and flat. Cut into quarters or strips, then cut in half. Add dough pieces to the slow cooker and stir to make sure they are submerged in the liquid. Cook for another 1 to 2 hours on Low.
